message: Let's be reasonable, I'm giving you a good deal!
I'm aiming for a more balanced split. This offer ensures a fair outcome for both of us.
Meet me in the middle of our previous offers, it's the fairest deal!
Time is running out, and we both lose if we don't agree. This offer is a compromise that still benefits you greatly.
I'm still willing to compromise, but I won't go below this.
This is my final offer. A perfectly even split.  Take it or leave it - we both lose out if we continue.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm giving you one more chance to accept a reasonable deal.
